Fairborn Primary School construction site photo
Fairborn Primary School new construction photo

div.span: In November 2016, the Fairborn community passed a multimillion dollar bond issue that is co-funding the construction of two new, state-of-the-art elementary school buildings in partnership with the Ohio Facilities Construction Commission. FCS is working with SHP Architects, Monarch Construction, STAN Engineers, & Hill International Consultants. To learn more about the project, click the "Facilities" tab above.
